power.title: Arc Lightning
power.fluff: Lightning leaps from your outstretched hand, weaving safely through your allies to bounce between your foes

element.name: Target:
element.text: One creature, or two creatures within 5 squares of each other

element.name: Effect:
element.text: If you targeted two creatures, both creatures take lightning damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus at the end of each creature's turn if they are within 5 squares of each other. This lasts until the end of your next turn.

element.name: Sustain Standard:
element.text: The effect persists until the end of your next turn.
In addition, you pull each creature two squares towards each other. If they end the pull adjacent to each other, both take 1d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.

power.title: Beguiling Strands
power.fluff: Strands of scintillating colors and gleaming lights cloud your enemies' minds and force them to move away

element.name: Hit:
element.text: Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus psychic damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.

element.name: Level 21:
element.text: 2 + Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus psychic damage.

element.name: Miss:
element.text: You push the target half the distance.

power.title: Breath of Night
power.fluff: At your whisper, the chill night wind answers, a forceful gust that heeds your will

element.name: Hit:
element.text: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier cold damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.

element.name: Miss:
element.text: You push the target half the distance.

element.name: Effect:
element.text: Until the end of your next turn, squares adjacent to you are difficult terrain for creatures other than you.
Additionally, a flying creature must succeed in a saving throw to enter one of these squares.

power.title: Brief Baleful Alteration
power.fluff: You reach out to touch your foe, and for an instant it transforms into a small, frightened beast that runs in a wild panic before returning to its true shape, bewildered

element.name: Hit:
element.text: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage. You knock the target prone and slide it a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.

element.name: Miss:
element.text: You slide the target half the distance.

element.name: Effect:
element.text: The target cannot take opportunity actions or immediate actions before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Chilling Cloud
power.fluff: A lingering swarm of ice crystals chills foes to the bone

element.name: Hit:
element.text: Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus cold damage.

element.name: Effect:
element.text: The area creates a zone of lingering ice crystals until the end of your next turn.
An enemy in the zone takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls.

power.title: Cloud of Daggers
power.fluff: You create a small cloud of whirling daggers of force that relentlessly attack creatures in the area

element.name: Target:
element.text: One creature in the center square

element.name: Effect:
element.text: The area creates a zone of whirling force daggers until the end of your next turn.
The zone is difficult terrain, and a creature that ends its turn in the zone takes force damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

element.name: Level 11:
element.text: 3 + Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus force damage.

element.name: Level 21:
element.text: 6 + Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus force damage.

power.title: Erupting Flare
power.fluff: You kindle a massive, sudden flame within your enemy that burns it and spills out to singe any who stay near

element.name: Effect:
element.text: Until the start of your next turn, any creature that ends its turn next to the target takes fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.
The target can end the effect as a minor action by succeeding in a Heal or Arcana check against a DC of 10 + your attack bonus with this power, not counting temporary bonuses.

element.name: Level 11:
element.text: 3 + Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus fire damage.

element.name: Level 21:
element.text: 6 + Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus fire damage.

power.title: Force Projectile
power.fluff: You concentrate arcane force into a crude projectiles and send them streaking at your enemies

element.name: Level 21:
element.text: One, two, three, or four creatures

element.name: Special:
element.text: You can use this power as a ranged basic attack. If an effect tells you to make one against a specific creature, you can only target that creature.

power.title: Freezing Burst
power.fluff: You hurl a hailstone toward your foes that explodes among them, temporarily turning the ground into an ice slick

power.title: Howling Wall
power.fluff: A screaming wind gusts across the battlefield, buffeting creatures in its path

element.name: Hit:
element.text: You slide the target up to 2 squares, and it is slowed until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Hypnotism
power.fluff: Your piercing gaze and whispered word let you seize momentary control of your enemy's mind

element.name: Target:
element.text: One creature that can see and hear you

element.name: Hit:
element.text: The target makes a melee basic attack against the creature of your choice as a free action. It has a +4 bonus to the attack roll.

power.title: Illusory Ambush
power.fluff: You create an illusion of swirling spectral assailants that swarm over your enemy

element.name: Critical:
element.text: The attack penalty from this power's effect increases to -4 on triggered attack rolls.

element.name: Effect:
element.text: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Magic Missile
power.fluff: A glowing blue bolt of magical energy hurtles from your finger and unerringly strikes your target

element.name: Effect:
element.text: 2 + Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus force damage.

element.name: Level 11:
element.text: 3 + Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus force damage.

element.name: Level 21:
element.text: 5 + Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus force damage.

element.name: Special:
element.text: This power counts as a ranged basic attack.

power.title: Nightmare Eruption
power.fluff: You bring forth a nightmare in your foe's mind and project it out for its comrades to see

element.name: Hit:
element.text: Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus psychic damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn. Make a secondary attack.

element.name: Miss:
element.text: The target is slowed until the end of your next turn. Make a secondary attack.

part.range: burst 1 centered on the primary target

element.name: Secondary Target:
element.text: Enemies in the burst other than the primary target

element.name: Effect:
element.text: You push each target 1 square from the primary target.

If the primary attack was a critical hit, this secondary attack gains the Psychic and Implement keywords, and each target also takes psychic damage equal to your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Phantasmal Assault
power.fluff: You conjure the image of a fearsome foe in your enemy's mind

element.name: Hit:
element.text: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

element.name: Miss:
element.text: The target grants combat advantage to the first attack against it before the end of your next turn.

element.name: Effect:
element.text: The target cannot make opportunity attacks before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Phantom Bolt
power.fluff: You wave your hand, and your foe sees an arcane bolt streaking towards it, causing it to dive away from the imagined threat
